alphabetsoup.framework
Class LetterType

java.lang.Object
  alphabetsoup.framework.Letter
      alphabetsoup.framework.LetterType

public class LetterType
extends Letter

LetterType extends Letter such that a Letter can be referred to as its type e.g. a HashSet of LetterType can be used to find out stats of each type of letter

Author:
chrishazard
